00068 static int point_data_used(PointDensity *pd)
00069 {
00070     int pd_bitflag = 0;
00071     
00072     if (pd->source == TEX_PD_PSYS) {
00073         if ((pd->noise_influence == TEX_PD_NOISE_VEL) || (pd->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_PARTICLE_VEL) || (pd->color_source == TEX_PD_COLOR_PARTVEL) || (pd->color_source == TEX_PD_COLOR_PARTSPEED))
00074             pd_bitflag |= POINT_DATA_VEL;
00075         if ((pd->noise_influence == TEX_PD_NOISE_AGE) || (pd->color_source == TEX_PD_COLOR_PARTAGE) || (pd->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_PARTICLE_AGE)) 
00076             pd_bitflag |= POINT_DATA_LIFE;
00077     }
00078         
00079     return pd_bitflag;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 /* additional data stored alongside the point density BVH, 
00084  * accessible by point index number to retrieve other information 
00085  * such as particle velocity or lifetime */
00086 static void alloc_point_data(PointDensity *pd, int total_particles, int point_data_used)
00087 {
00088     int data_size = 0;
00089     
00090     if (point_data_used & POINT_DATA_VEL) {
00091         /* store 3 channels of velocity data */
00092         data_size += 3;
00093     }
00094     if (point_data_used & POINT_DATA_LIFE) {
00095         /* store 1 channel of lifetime data */
00096         data_size += 1;
00097     }
00098 
00099     if (data_size)
00100         pd->point_data = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float)*data_size*total_particles, "particle point data");
00101 }
00102 
00103 static void pointdensity_cache_psys(Render *re, PointDensity *pd, Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
00104 {
00105     DerivedMesh* dm;
00106     ParticleKey state;
00107     ParticleSimulationData sim= {NULL};
00108     ParticleData *pa=NULL;
00109     float cfra = BKE_curframe(re->scene);
00110     int i /*, childexists*/ /* UNUSED */;
00111     int total_particles, offset=0;
00112     int data_used = point_data_used(pd);
00113     float partco[3];
00114     float obview[4][4];
00115     
00116     /* init everything */
00117     if (!psys || !ob || !pd) return;
00118 
00119     mult_m4_m4m4(obview, ob->obmat, re->viewinv);
00120     
00121     /* Just to create a valid rendering context for particles */
00122     psys_render_set(ob, psys, re->viewmat, re->winmat, re->winx, re->winy, 0);
00123     
00124     dm = mesh_create_derived_render(re->scene, ob,CD_MASK_BAREMESH|CD_MASK_MTFACE|CD_MASK_MCOL);
00125     
00126     if ( !psys_check_enabled(ob, psys)) {
00127         psys_render_restore(ob, psys);
00128         return;
00129     }
00130     
00131     sim.scene= re->scene;
00132     sim.ob= ob;
00133     sim.psys= psys;
00134 
00135     /* in case ob->imat isn't up-to-date */
00136     invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00137     
00138     total_particles = psys->totpart+psys->totchild;
00139     psys->lattice=psys_get_lattice(&sim);
00140     
00141     pd->point_tree = BLI_bvhtree_new(total_particles, 0.0, 4, 6);
00142     alloc_point_data(pd, total_particles, data_used);
00143     pd->totpoints = total_particles;
00144     if (data_used & POINT_DATA_VEL) offset = pd->totpoints*3;
00145     
00146 #if 0 /* UNUSED */
00147     if (psys->totchild > 0 && !(psys->part->draw & PART_DRAW_PARENT))
00148         childexists = 1;
00149 #endif
00150 
00151     for (i=0, pa=psys->particles; i < total_particles; i++, pa++) {
00152 
00153         state.time = cfra;
00154         if (psys_get_particle_state(&sim, i, &state, 0)) {
00155             
00156             copy_v3_v3(partco, state.co);
00157             
00158             if (pd->psys_cache_space == TEX_PD_OBJECTSPACE)
00159                 mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, partco);
00160             else if (pd->psys_cache_space == TEX_PD_OBJECTLOC) {
00161                 sub_v3_v3(partco, ob->loc);
00162             }
00163             else {
00164                 /* TEX_PD_WORLDSPACE */
00165             }
00166             
00167             BLI_bvhtree_insert(pd->point_tree, i, partco, 1);
00168             
00169             if (data_used & POINT_DATA_VEL) {
00170                 pd->point_data[i*3 + 0] = state.vel[0];
00171                 pd->point_data[i*3 + 1] = state.vel[1];
00172                 pd->point_data[i*3 + 2] = state.vel[2];
00173             } 
00174             if (data_used & POINT_DATA_LIFE) {
00175                 float pa_time;
00176                 
00177                 if (i < psys->totpart) {
00178                     pa_time = (cfra - pa->time)/pa->lifetime;
00179                 }
00180                 else {
00181                     ChildParticle *cpa= (psys->child + i) - psys->totpart;
00182                     float pa_birthtime, pa_dietime;
00183                     
00184                     pa_time = psys_get_child_time(psys, cpa, cfra, &pa_birthtime, &pa_dietime);
00185                 }
00186                 
00187                 pd->point_data[offset + i] = pa_time;
00188                 
00189             }
00190         }
00191     }
00192     
00193     BLI_bvhtree_balance(pd->point_tree);
00194     dm->release(dm);
00195     
00196     if (psys->lattice) {
00197         end_latt_deform(psys->lattice);
00198         psys->lattice=0;
00199     }
00200     
00201     psys_render_restore(ob, psys);
00202 }

00205 static void pointdensity_cache_object(Render *re, PointDensity *pd, Object *ob)
00206 {
00207     int i;
00208     DerivedMesh *dm;
00209     MVert *mvert = NULL;
00210     
00211     dm = mesh_create_derived_render(re->scene, ob,  CD_MASK_BAREMESH|CD_MASK_MTFACE|CD_MASK_MCOL);
00212     mvert= dm->getVertArray(dm);    /* local object space */
00213     
00214     pd->totpoints= dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00215     if (pd->totpoints == 0) return;
00216 
00217     pd->point_tree = BLI_bvhtree_new(pd->totpoints, 0.0, 4, 6);
00218     
00219     for (i=0; i < pd->totpoints; i++, mvert++) {
00220         float co[3];
00221         
00222         copy_v3_v3(co, mvert->co);
00223 
00224         switch(pd->ob_cache_space) {
00225             case TEX_PD_OBJECTSPACE:
00226                 break;
00227             case TEX_PD_OBJECTLOC:
00228                 mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, co);
00229                 sub_v3_v3(co, ob->loc);
00230                 break;
00231             case TEX_PD_WORLDSPACE:
00232             default:
00233                 mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, co);
00234                 break;
00235         }
00236 
00237         BLI_bvhtree_insert(pd->point_tree, i, co, 1);
00238     }
00239     
00240     BLI_bvhtree_balance(pd->point_tree);
00241     dm->release(dm);
00242 
00243 }
00244 void cache_pointdensity(Render *re, Tex *tex)
00245 {
00246     PointDensity *pd = tex->pd;
00247     
00248     if (!pd)
00249         return;
00250 
00251     if (pd->point_tree) {
00252         BLI_bvhtree_free(pd->point_tree);
00253         pd->point_tree = NULL;
00254     }
00255     
00256     if (pd->source == TEX_PD_PSYS) {
00257         Object *ob = pd->object;
00258         ParticleSystem *psys;
00259 
00260         if (!ob || !pd->psys) return;
00261 
00262         psys= BLI_findlink(&ob->particlesystem, pd->psys-1);
00263         if (!psys) return;
00264         
00265         pointdensity_cache_psys(re, pd, ob, psys);
00266     }
00267     else if (pd->source == TEX_PD_OBJECT) {
00268         Object *ob = pd->object;
00269         if (ob && ob->type == OB_MESH)
00270             pointdensity_cache_object(re, pd, ob);
00271     }
00272 }
00273 
00274 static void free_pointdensity(Render *UNUSED(re), Tex *tex)
00275 {
00276     PointDensity *pd = tex->pd;
00277 
00278     if (!pd) return;
00279     
00280     if (pd->point_tree) {
00281         BLI_bvhtree_free(pd->point_tree);
00282         pd->point_tree = NULL;
00283     }
00284 
00285     if (pd->point_data) {
00286         MEM_freeN(pd->point_data);
00287         pd->point_data = NULL;
00288     }
00289     pd->totpoints = 0;
00290 }

00293 
00294 void make_pointdensities(Render *re)
00295 {
00296     Tex *tex;
00297     
00298     if (re->scene->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS)
00299         return;
00300     
00301     re->i.infostr= "Caching Point Densities";
00302     re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00303 
00304     for (tex= re->main->tex.first; tex; tex= tex->id.next) {
00305         if (tex->id.us && tex->type==TEX_POINTDENSITY) {
00306             cache_pointdensity(re, tex);
00307         }
00308     }
00309     
00310     re->i.infostr= NULL;
00311     re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00312 }
00313 
00314 void free_pointdensities(Render *re)
00315 {
00316     Tex *tex;
00317     
00318     if (re->scene->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS)
00319         return;
00320     
00321     for (tex= re->main->tex.first; tex; tex= tex->id.next) {
00322         if (tex->id.us && tex->type==TEX_POINTDENSITY) {
00323             free_pointdensity(re, tex);
00324         }
00325     }
00326 }
00327 
00328 typedef struct PointDensityRangeData
00329 {
00330     float *density;
00331     float squared_radius;
00332     float *point_data;
00333     float *vec;
00334     float softness;
00335     short falloff_type;
00336     short noise_influence;
00337     float *age;
00338     int point_data_used;
00339     int offset;
00340     struct CurveMapping *density_curve;
00341     float velscale;
00342 } PointDensityRangeData;
00343 
00344 static void accum_density(void *userdata, int index, float squared_dist)
00345 {
00346     PointDensityRangeData *pdr = (PointDensityRangeData *)userdata;
00347     const float dist = (pdr->squared_radius - squared_dist) / pdr->squared_radius * 0.5f;
00348     float density = 0.0f;
00349     
00350     if (pdr->point_data_used & POINT_DATA_VEL) {
00351         pdr->vec[0] += pdr->point_data[index*3 + 0]; // * density;
00352         pdr->vec[1] += pdr->point_data[index*3 + 1]; // * density;
00353         pdr->vec[2] += pdr->point_data[index*3 + 2]; // * density;
00354     }
00355     if (pdr->point_data_used & POINT_DATA_LIFE) {
00356         *pdr->age += pdr->point_data[pdr->offset + index]; // * density;
00357     }
00358     
00359     if (pdr->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_STD)
00360         density = dist;
00361     else if (pdr->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_SMOOTH)
00362         density = 3.0f*dist*dist - 2.0f*dist*dist*dist;
00363     else if (pdr->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_SOFT)
00364         density = pow(dist, pdr->softness);
00365     else if (pdr->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_CONSTANT)
00366         density = pdr->squared_radius;
00367     else if (pdr->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_ROOT)
00368         density = sqrt(dist);
00369     else if (pdr->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_PARTICLE_AGE) {
00370         if (pdr->point_data_used & POINT_DATA_LIFE)
00371             density = dist*MIN2(pdr->point_data[pdr->offset + index], 1.0f);
00372         else
00373             density = dist;
00374     }
00375     else if (pdr->falloff_type == TEX_PD_FALLOFF_PARTICLE_VEL) {
00376         if (pdr->point_data_used & POINT_DATA_VEL)
00377             density = dist*len_v3(pdr->point_data + index*3)*pdr->velscale;
00378         else
00379             density = dist;
00380     }
00381     
00382     if (pdr->density_curve && dist != 0.0f) {
00383         density = curvemapping_evaluateF(pdr->density_curve, 0, density/dist)*dist;
00384     }
00385     
00386     *pdr->density += density;
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00390 static void init_pointdensityrangedata(PointDensity *pd, PointDensityRangeData *pdr, 
00391     float *density, float *vec, float *age, struct CurveMapping *density_curve, float velscale)
00392 {
00393     pdr->squared_radius = pd->radius*pd->radius;
00394     pdr->density = density;
00395     pdr->point_data = pd->point_data;
00396     pdr->falloff_type = pd->falloff_type;
00397     pdr->vec = vec;
00398     pdr->age = age;
00399     pdr->softness = pd->falloff_softness;
00400     pdr->noise_influence = pd->noise_influence;
00401     pdr->point_data_used = point_data_used(pd);
00402     pdr->offset = (pdr->point_data_used & POINT_DATA_VEL)?pd->totpoints*3:0;
00403     pdr->density_curve = density_curve;
00404     pdr->velscale = velscale;
00405 }
00406 
00407 
00408 int pointdensitytex(Tex *tex, float *texvec, TexResult *texres)
00409 {
00410     int retval = TEX_INT;
00411     PointDensity *pd = tex->pd;
00412     PointDensityRangeData pdr;
00413     float density=0.0f, age=0.0f, time=0.0f;
00414     float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, co[3];
00415     float col[4];
00416     float turb, noise_fac;
00417     int num=0;
00418     
00419     texres->tin = 0.0f;
00420     
00421     if ((!pd) || (!pd->point_tree))     
00422         return 0;
00423         
00424     init_pointdensityrangedata(pd, &pdr, &density, vec, &age, 
00425         (pd->flag&TEX_PD_FALLOFF_CURVE ? pd->falloff_curve : NULL), pd->falloff_speed_scale*0.001f);
00426     noise_fac = pd->noise_fac * 0.5f;   /* better default */
00427     
00428     copy_v3_v3(co, texvec);
00429     
00430     if (point_data_used(pd)) {
00431         /* does a BVH lookup to find accumulated density and additional point data *
00432          * stores particle velocity vector in 'vec', and particle lifetime in 'time' */
00433         num = BLI_bvhtree_range_query(pd->point_tree, co, pd->radius, accum_density, &pdr);
00434         if (num > 0) {
00435             age /= num;
00436             mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.0f/num);
00437         }
00438         
00439         /* reset */
00440         density = vec[0] = vec[1] = vec[2] = 0.0f;
00441     }
00442     
00443     if (pd->flag & TEX_PD_TURBULENCE) {
00444     
00445         if (pd->noise_influence == TEX_PD_NOISE_AGE) {
00446             turb = BLI_gTurbulence(pd->noise_size, texvec[0]+age, texvec[1]+age, texvec[2]+age, pd->noise_depth, 0, pd->noise_basis);
00447         }
00448         else if (pd->noise_influence == TEX_PD_NOISE_TIME) {
00449             time = R.cfra / (float)R.r.efra;
00450             turb = BLI_gTurbulence(pd->noise_size, texvec[0]+time, texvec[1]+time, texvec[2]+time, pd->noise_depth, 0, pd->noise_basis);
00451             //turb = BLI_turbulence(pd->noise_size, texvec[0]+time, texvec[1]+time, texvec[2]+time, pd->noise_depth);
00452         }
00453         else {
00454             turb = BLI_gTurbulence(pd->noise_size, texvec[0]+vec[0], texvec[1]+vec[1], texvec[2]+vec[2], pd->noise_depth, 0, pd->noise_basis);
00455         }
00456 
00457         turb -= 0.5f;   /* re-center 0.0-1.0 range around 0 to prevent offsetting result */
00458         
00459         /* now we have an offset coordinate to use for the density lookup */
00460         co[0] = texvec[0] + noise_fac * turb;
00461         co[1] = texvec[1] + noise_fac * turb;
00462         co[2] = texvec[2] + noise_fac * turb;
00463     }
00464 
00465     /* BVH query with the potentially perturbed coordinates */
00466     num = BLI_bvhtree_range_query(pd->point_tree, co, pd->radius, accum_density, &pdr);
00467     if (num > 0) {
00468         age /= num;
00469         mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.0f/num);
00470     }
00471     
00472     texres->tin = density;
00473     BRICONT;
00474     
00475     if (pd->color_source == TEX_PD_COLOR_CONSTANT)
00476         return retval;
00477     
00478     retval |= TEX_RGB;
00479     
00480     switch (pd->color_source) {
00481         case TEX_PD_COLOR_PARTAGE:
00482             if (pd->coba) {
00483                 if (do_colorband(pd->coba, age, col)) {
00484                     texres->talpha= 1;
00485                     copy_v3_v3(&texres->tr, col);
00486                     texres->tin *= col[3];
00487                     texres->ta = texres->tin;
00488                 }
00489             }
00490             break;
00491         case TEX_PD_COLOR_PARTSPEED:
00492         {
00493             float speed = len_v3(vec) * pd->speed_scale;
00494             
00495             if (pd->coba) {
00496                 if (do_colorband(pd->coba, speed, col)) {
00497                     texres->talpha= 1;  
00498                     copy_v3_v3(&texres->tr, col);
00499                     texres->tin *= col[3];
00500                     texres->ta = texres->tin;
00501                 }
00502             }
00503             break;
00504         }
00505         case TEX_PD_COLOR_PARTVEL:
00506             texres->talpha= 1;
00507             mul_v3_fl(vec, pd->speed_scale);
00508             copy_v3_v3(&texres->tr, vec);
00509             texres->ta = texres->tin;
00510             break;
00511         case TEX_PD_COLOR_CONSTANT:
00512         default:
00513             texres->tr = texres->tg = texres->tb = texres->ta = 1.0f;
00514             break;
00515     }
00516     BRICONTRGB;
00517     
00518     return retval;
00519     
00520 #if 0
00521     if (texres->nor!=NULL) {
00522         texres->nor[0] = texres->nor[1] = texres->nor[2] = 0.0f;
00523     }
00524 #endif
00525 }
